content.text:
# Queen's Covers

'Queen's Covers' (TC: 聽后感) is a Mandopop album by Edmond Leung, his second studio album in Mandarin.
Track listing
#Step By Step (一步步)
#You Exist in My Song (我的歌聲裡)
#Bravery (勇氣)
#I'm Not Sad (我不難過)
#Conquer (征服)
#Better Halves  (半邊生命)

!width=60|Year
!width="350"|Ceremony
!width="450"|Award
|-

| IFPI Hong Kong Top Sales Music Award 2014
